TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 与 事件结合使用，当特定 的解析请求完成时，就会终止此事件。

span.span: Used in conjunction with the event, which is signaled when a resolve request for a specific has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 ResolveCompletedEventArgs 对象，实例化对象，并利用一种解决方法。To use the ResolveCompletedEventArgs object, instantiate a object and utilize one of the Resolve methods. 对于异步处理，使用方法。For asynchronous processing, use the method. 冲突解决程序当达到结束查询的群，或它已达到的最大记录的条目数它所构造，则会引发事件，以完成解决过程，以及作为关联的委托导致 ResolveAsync 才能完成。When the Resolver has reached the end of the Cloud(s) to query for the , or it has reached the maximum number of record entries for the it is constructing, the event to complete the resolve process is raised, and the associated delegate causes ResolveAsync to complete. 异常完成，不会返回一个集合，也可以引发该事件。The event can also be raised for abnormal completions, which do not return a collection. 仅当已找到的所有终结点后，将引发此事件。This event is raised only once when all endpoints have been found. 对解析程序对象的此实例的所有引用都都与提供的令牌，这是此异步解析请求的唯一的开发人员确定标识符协调。All references to this instance of the Resolver object are coordinated with a supplied token, which is a unique, developer-determined identifier for this asynchronous resolve request.

MemberSignature.Value: public ResolveCompletedEventArgs (System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerNameRecordCollection peerNameRecordCollection, Exception error, bool canceled, object userToken);

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PeerNameRecordCollection As PeerNameRecordCollection

summary.span: 获取要解析的 对象。

value.span: 要解析的 对象就是在特定 的 操作的响应中发现的对象。

span.span: The object to resolve is the one found in response to a operation on a specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时已经为此对等名称，查询所有云或检索到的最大对等名称记录数后，将引发此事件。This event is raised when all clouds have been queried for this peer name, or when the maximum number of peer name records has been retrieved. 通过将放到的对等名称记录集合引发OnResolveCompleted 方法等待事件自变量。It is raised by putting the peer name record collection into the event argument for which the OnResolveCompleted method is waiting. 状态的更改将唤醒该进程。The change in state awakens the process. 除非显式指定，否则针对所有引用类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 `null`，针对 `int` 类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 0。Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is `null` for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type `int`. 如果未不找到任何记录，`null`返回。If no records were found, `null` is returned.
